title: Katarinas Project skin bug?
body:
Does anyone else have the problem with PROJECT: Katarina being bugged? When i use it for me it is classic katarina (both the sounds and skin), but for everyone else in the game it is PROJECT. I don't really know if riot knows about this or if it's only me but i hope it can get fixed soon if you know a reason or something that may explain why it is happening, please tell me. (Sad Kata main is sad) ;c{{item:3070}} {{champion:55}} {{item:3070}}
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Hey! 

I loaded her up in game and I'm hearing PROJECT: Katarina sounds, as opposed to the base? Have you tried doing a client repair? Since we patch every two weeks, there's a chance a file or two may have found its way into the wrong spot. 

You can perform a client repair by doing the following - 

* Open the League of Legends Launcher.
* Click the Gear button to open the Settings menu.
* Click the "Repair" button. The repair process will take about 30-60 minutes

Lemme know if this solves the issue. If not, we can dig a bit more.
Okay, thank you so much, it worked! Though the sounds was weird for the next game i just quit and started a new and it was all back to normal! {{champion:55}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
